body: A spellcaster who is entangled and casts a spell with the force descriptor can choose to take a 20% chance of spell failure on that spell. If she successfully casts the spell, she ends the entangled condition, or if she is anchored, her movement is no longer prevented, but she is still entangled.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellblights/Description of Spellblights/Optional Benefits of Harmful Conditions/Entangled
name: Entangled
